it.polimi.ingsw.lim.parser

Class Writer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.parser.Writer

  • public class Writer
extends java.lang.Object
    The task of this class is to write in a file all the game parameters, in order to make the game persistent
